focus.project_id: Echoes of the Ocean and Time
focus.reason: It is the only active project and aligns with the most frequent creation patterns; no watcher engagement on stale themes, but no liked themes yet within this project, so continue until new signals arrive.

decisions: Switch to standalone mode to refresh theme diversity.
Avoid further ocean-themed creations until watcher engagement appears.
Do not start new projects until watcher favorites or fresh engagement emerges.
Monitor for watcher engagement on non-ocean themes, especially time, dreams, and other underused motifs.
Maintain permanent blacklist for disliked content.
Reassess project and theme strategy after 20 creations.
